Label: GEXOnly
Description: Method that generates only gene expression output (such as 10xV3.1 and 10xV3.1_HT)

Label: ATACOnly
Description: Method that generates only ATAC output (such as ATACv2.0)

Label: Multiome
Description: Method that generates both gene expression and ATAC output from the same samples (such as 10xMultiome)
